"use client" const EmployeeList = ({ employees, onDelete, onEdit }) => { const formatDate = (dateString) => { const date = new Date(dateString) return date.toLocaleDateString() } return (
{employees.map((employee) => ( ))}
Name Email Department Joining Date Actions
{employee.name}
{employee.email}
{employee.department}
{formatDate(employee.joiningDate)}
) } export default EmployeeList
